website_summaries.verdict: Versatile, all-season gaiters. Heavy-duty material and waterproof protection perfect for cross-country or downhill skiing.
pros: Elastic bottom allows them to easily fit over any sized boot
Adjustable underfoot closure that allows you to tighten or loosen them, creating a customized fit
Comfortable enough to wear against bare skin during summer hikes
cons: Underfoot adjustable strap is too short

customer_reviews.title: Sizing info is useless.  This item should be sized by calf measurement.
customer_reviews.text: Here is the manufacturer's sizing information, though it's pretty worthless in my opinion.  I wear a size 10 shoe so I got the Large gaiters. They were waaaaaay too small. My calves measure 19" around when wearing a pair of jeans. Calf measurement would be a much better way of sizing this item.
customer_reviews.author: JS Randall

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Excellent fit Keeps the snow out in the winter Keeps splashes and splatters down in other seasons Comfortable Don't slide down Cons: None Notes: I've used these many times in both snowy and wet environments. They worked exactly as expected and didn't bother me one bit. Stayed in place while post-holing through waist deep snow drifts (without snowshoes) and even managed to still keep the snow out. I wear Merell Moab Ventilator Mids when hiking (all conditions) and they fit perfectly! Another excellent Outdoor Research product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ross

customer_reviews.title: Quality Gaiters.
customer_reviews.text: These gaiters have served me well in every condition from Colorado winter snow to Alaskan backcountry brush. In all scenarios these gaiters have proven easily manuverable while providing maximum protection against scathing thistle, unrelenting snow, and swampy conditions. These gaiters even kept my socks/boots dry from a ~10second submersion in shin depth fast flowing glacial waters. Well worth the money spent. I have used these gaiters solely with 8" waterproof leather hiking boots, and am unsure how they would perform with other styles or sizes of boots.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy and Not Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Since we wore them once already, I guess we are not able to return them? The top snap closure is very, very flimsy. If OR had invested another dime for a better piece, it would improve. As the way it is now, that part will break off very easily. Gather closure is a good idea, but because of it, these gaiters are not able to breathe. Guaranteed to collect moisture...will get very wet from sweat. Want a good one? Try OR Expedition Crocodile. We had them for two years...still work great.
customer_reviews.author: bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: I'd say if you larger calves you'd be fine in these
customer_reviews.text: I ordered based on the size chart on the OR website. I am a woman and wear a size 8-8.5 in mens shoes so I bought the medium. They do fit my shoes well (my snow boots are men's size 8) but the calf enclosure at the top I have to cinch quite tight to make them stay up. So, I'd say if you larger calves you'd be fine in these. They do stay put, I just have quite a bit of strap flapping around so perhaps I'll trim it. I have worn these for snowshoeing and they work quite nicely to keep the snow out of my boots.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B.

customer_reviews.title: These have been great the past year keeping me dry
customer_reviews.text: These have been great the past year keeping me dry, as well as clean when its time to crawl into the tent at the end of the day. Only complaint I have is the buckle at the top that's use to cinch down above the calf, tends to now easily come undone. I think its due to my small calves and having to have them really tight. Regardless, every OR product has a lifetime warranty, so if it gets any worse I can easily have them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: dawgpound87

customer_reviews.title: Love these and this is my second pair
customer_reviews.text: I lost weight so I went from a medium to a small men's size. From the beginning, I have been a huge fan of these and took them trekking thru Guatemala and all the volcanoes...never had dirt, water or sand issues with my socks. This is a great product for rain and mud on the Camino as well. I have Dirty Girl's for the hot, humid Georgia Summer hiking but these do the trick in all other weather!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Beltran

customer_reviews.title: Great for mud season
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these gaiters. The leather strap that goes under your foot stays in the buckle much better than other brands that use a show lace type of strap. Though I'm worried that the strap my fail due to wear and tear, but I'd be willing to purchase a new pair. The gaiters themselves don't fall down your leg very often unless your wearing baggy clothing. All in all great for winter, mud season or after a rain shower where everything is wet.
customer_reviews.author: Travis A.

customer_reviews.title: Get the right size.
customer_reviews.text: If you get the right size, they work like a charm. Vere easy to put on and take off again, and they do help keeping snow out of your boots. The size, I believe, refers to the circumference of your calves so if you are wearing long underwear, thick pants and long socks, you will need a larger size than you think.
customer_reviews.author: Danwood

customer_reviews.title: These were great until the cheap plastic buckle broke
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 pairs of these Outdoor Research Men's Rocky Mountain High Gaiters. The newest one, purchased only a year ago (and maybe used a few dozen times), has a broken top buckle, making them useless. See picture. Otherwise they were great. Sure wish they would test and use better materials.
customer_reviews.author: Mechanical Engineer

customer_reviews.title: Really good BUT
customer_reviews.text: They work pretty good, but I would make the lower straps longer so you can insert them in the small flap and the upper straps don't have any securing device so they just flip all the time which can be annoying. They work well and can be tighten up but jeez the flapping bothers me a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Camilo Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Using these for my moto to keep wet and road ...
customer_reviews.text: Using these for my moto to keep wet and road grime off the pants because chaps are out of the question when you’re going for that ‘cafe racer’ look. Quality construction and utility from OR, as always, but design-wise, top ribbon that cinches at the knee is limited in in snugness before the ribbon twists on itself, effectively denying as secure a fit as I need (top of gaiter slips down the leg with movement)
customer_reviews.author: Jsinbnda

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize that they used Velcro to close and I did not like the buckle they used that goes under the boot. I returned them without using them and went with another brand with a zipper.
customer_reviews.author: steve m.

customer_reviews.title: Run pretty small, especially if you have any calf muscles
customer_reviews.text: I have thicker, muscular hiking-person calves, so this didn't even come close to fitting me (I bought the XL, according to their size chart at Mens 13). I was really disappointed as I wanted a good gaiter for snow sports and trail tromping. I haven't tried their XXL, but not sure if I want to order it. I returned these the day I got them. Hoping to find a good gaiter, still.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Riel

customer_reviews.title: ... help keep stuff out of my boots and are easy to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: These really help keep stuff out of my boots and are easy to put on and take off. The top part that tightens around the calf is a little large but dont think I could have gotten the bottom to tighten if I had gone a size smaller. So far thaey are great at also keeping seeds and briars from attaching to my clothing also.
customer_reviews.author: Ole Man Winter

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: These worked fine for me. Easy on/off, reasonably priced. I bought a size large and they are a bit big for me, I'm a 5'7" tall woman and maybe I could have gotten away with a size medium, but better too large than too small. I have large feet, my snowshoeing boots are equivalent to men's size 9, so I bought size large to make sure they fit properly over my boots, which they do. They keep my feet and legs dry while snowshoeing. They're a bit loose at the top even when completely cinched up, but I think I can fix that with a simple velcro tab.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, glad that I brought and used these.
customer_reviews.text: Once I got them on correctly, they fit great (try them on before you need them.) I used them in hiking Scotland. There were some very boggy patches and this really help keeps pants cleaner and boots drier. I have been hiking a long time and had not bothered to get a pair prior to this. I should have. I will be carrying them from now on
customer_reviews.author: Adam Shields

customer_reviews.title: not too bad
customer_reviews.text: so I got extra large because I'm tall (6' 3") , but apparently extra large also means 'beefy calves' which I don't have. The strap on the top barely goes small enough to hold on to my calves. I'm going to have to get some sort of cinch to tighten the gaiters on top to keep them from sagging. but the length is good.
customer_reviews.author: G. Kimber II

customer_reviews.title: Another solid product from Ooutdoor Research
customer_reviews.text: Nice mid price point gaiters. Bought according to the fit chart and they fit perfect with snow hiking/snow shoe boots. Definitely superior quality and detail compared to the "under $20" selections. Worth the extra few dollars
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: glad i got this tall version
customer_reviews.text: glad i got this tall version. they not only kept my socks and inside of boots clean, they cut down on scratches and urushiol. i believe they could be improved by slightly tapering before the drawcord. it is a lot of material to gather.
customer_reviews.author: Ja Ja

customer_reviews.title: good product, reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I have seen other gators that are heavier and more durable, but these work just fine for the average person at less cost than many others.
customer_reviews.author: bobbie johnson

customer_reviews.title: They work exactly as promised and are perfectly comfortable to wear on a daily basis
customer_reviews.text: I walk or ride my bike to work every day of the week. I live a little less than a mile from my office and bought these to combat my pant legs getting wet in the rain or snow. They work exactly as promised and are perfectly comfortable to wear on a daily basis. The velcro closures make them easy to put on and take off. After a full winter walking with them over snow and ice, they have held up very well. Very glad I made this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: stvwebphoto

customer_reviews.title: Fits ok but not 100% happy with the front velcro
customer_reviews.text: Fits ok but not 100% happy with the front velcro. A bit of a work to close it nicely... a little hurry and there will be bumps and gaps. I just don't get why no company put the velcro on the back side? It is more straight and doesn't hit water snow directly while walking, so less chance of leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Anirban Roy

customer_reviews.title: xl size
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'5" and wear size L pants. The XL size is way to small. I'll have to pay a seamstress to add material in the back. The boot straps are also short. Quality is good otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Greenhaw

customer_reviews.title: Great Gators!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, great gators. Beat the snot out of these things and they are in perfect shape. Snow, mud, rain, protect your boots and your pants for a small price. Just make sure you read how to put them on, it does make a difference in comfort and fit. I have seen people with gators on wrong and it really only takes a minute to put on.
customer_reviews.author: CAD Junky

customer_reviews.title: Well made, Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: These are going to last a long time. Very good material and very good straps. I use these for snowshoeing and they keep the snow out even in the deep stuff. Good price. OR is a brand I trust. They did not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Baird

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these gaiters
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a decent price. These have worked very well for me while snow-shoeing. I bought a pair of women's gaiters for my girlfriend too and we're both happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Boomx2

customer_reviews.title: I post holed through almost knee deep snow with snow shoes on the back side of Mt Massive and they did great. Stayed in place et
customer_reviews.text: they do what there suppose to do. I am 5' 9" and got the medium size and they go just below the knee. I post holed through almost knee deep snow with snow shoes on the back side of Mt Massive and they did great. Stayed in place etc. easy on easy off even in super cold conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: they were perfect on snowy runs
customer_reviews.text: These paid for themselves on the first day of the big storm. These kept snow out while shoveling. Also, they were perfect on snowy runs, muddy hikes, and keeping feet and ankles warm and dry.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: So they fit a little smaller than I thought, but since they are so adjustable, they will fit. I have put them on regular summer boots and big Scarpa mountaineering boots. They can absolutely put up with being abused.
customer_reviews.author: Jayde Hart

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Overall good buy and as expected.
customer_reviews.author: S.Welch

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Good for keeping dust and debris off but not so good at repelling water
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great gaiter for winter
customer_reviews.text: The gaiters fit better than others I have purchased especially over winter boots. I used them a few times this season trudging through 24”-30” of snow and they worked perfectly. It is a bit tricky to figure out how to tie the lace around the bottom of the boot but the lace worked better for wider winter boots than other gaiters I have purchased. I wish I would have purchased these earlier, it would have saved me from boots full of snow.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works until you try to wash it
customer_reviews.text: These gators are great for hiking and keeping the mud/snow out of your boots. They are easy to put on. Only con is when I washed them the leather straps began to fray. You'd think OR would have better durability. Still happy but don't wash or else they'll start to fray.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Warren

customer_reviews.title: OR makes good products
customer_reviews.text: OR gaiters are some of the best out there. I've already got my money's worth with these. Fit was accurate. Can really cinch them down or open them up if you have special fitting needs. Kept ticks and poison ivy off me on well over 100 miles of wear now.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Geronimo Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Rugged +
customer_reviews.text: Super rugged, very wide velcro, bulletproof thick bottom straps, heavy duty for the worst conditions.
customer_reviews.author: CK in NH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My large calves barely fit in these. I'm 6'1", 210 lbs. Shoe size 10.5-11. Still worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hard to fit on.
customer_reviews.text: These were hard for me to get on the boots correctly. Too much bending for a senior.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbo_66

customer_reviews.title: Bone Dry
customer_reviews.text: These gaiters keep my feet and lower legs dry as a bone trudging through snow and wet morning dew. My nephew was so impressed, I bought him a pair as a present. Great value, great Product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Designed way too small to be usable
customer_reviews.text: Designed way too small. It wouldn't even zip up over my boots and bluejeans let alone some kind of winter over-all.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny L Nipp

customer_reviews.title: shoe size 10 and the large is a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I like that it has a metal clip at the bottom to attach to the laces. Keeps my pant legs dry.
customer_reviews.author: dobie

customer_reviews.title: I like the leather strap on the bottom and overall performed ...
customer_reviews.text: The top velcro at the calf is a bit large for me. It doesn't fall down but doesn't tighten securely either. I like the leather strap on the bottom and overall performed well snowshoeing.
customer_reviews.author: koko

customer_reviews.title: They are sized small I am 6" 225lbs and they ...
customer_reviews.text: They are sized small I am 6" 225lbs and they are very snug in the calf hasve no wiggle room gave them to my nephew who is slightly smaller and he loves em =\
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy J.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are so great. They definitely helped keep the mud off my boots, and keep me dry.
customer_reviews.author: HelloImTheWanderer

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Keeps wear and tear on hiking pants to a minimum
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good gaiters
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'1" and thin and the mediums fit well. Not a lot of room to spare though, something to consider. For this money a zipper would have been nice, but just Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: John the backpacker

customer_reviews.title: Great product...runs small though.
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality of this item is great! It has a great storm tab, solid heel strap, and well sewn Velcro. Although as in other reviews these do run small, and the sizing chart is all but useless. I am an average size guy, 5'11 with 18" calves (with jeans on) and I ordered the medium which were way to small.
customer_reviews.author: Chris K.

customer_reviews.title: Work great.
customer_reviews.text: great for work, easy on and off snow guards. Don't allways stay on perfectly but great for price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family has a pair and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great job on design and overall performance. I bought another brand and the brackets broke. These will not brake!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Mendenhall

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Prodict arrived on time . Good quality, time will tell iif sturdy enough for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Smith

customer_reviews.title: Got the for husband to wear during winterizing of sprinkling ...
customer_reviews.text: Got the for husband to wear during winterizing of sprinkling systems. He is taller that average these stood up for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Mullarkey

customer_reviews.title: Dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My calfs are larger than the average dude so I was worried about the fit but they slipped on fine. Work great for keeping water off legs and out of my hunting boots!
customer_reviews.author: Dutchunter

customer_reviews.title: Solid pair of gaiters
customer_reviews.text: Solid pair of gaiters, goes right over my Scarpa Charmoz mountaineering boots, though I have to work to get it on properly. I also wish it was a bit tighter around my calves, but these are a decent pair of gaiters.
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: better go with a smaller fit
customer_reviews.text: Size is tough to gage, better go with a smaller fit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: OR hits the spot
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Sturdy, and true to size. Best gaiter for the money. I use them for upland hunting, hiking, and riding the fat bike when it’s frigid and snowy. Keeps feet and ankles warm and dry when used with a proper waterproof boot.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product great quality.
customer_reviews.text: First time using gaiters while hunting and boy was it a game changer. My feet and legs stayed super dry even in the Washington rains.
customer_reviews.author: Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Research has never let me down so far.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, loved them. Outdoor Research has never let me down so far. Totally saved my legs while backpacking through very dense thicket. No problems with them falling down or coming undone and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Louis F.

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: Really like these, not a blast to put on but none of them are. Saves my bunny boots when walking thru brush and keeps bottoms of pants from turning into ice.
customer_reviews.author: my opinion

customer_reviews.title: Great OR product
customer_reviews.text: We are avid winter hikers. These gaitors are great in snow and wet conditions, made well, last well, often get beat up and still hold up. Water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a SAR member, we went in a all day search, they performed as expected, AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Molina

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these mainly for snow shoeing and winter hiking. I am an average weight 5' 7" female and I ordered a men's medium. I find them to fit fine if they are just going over hiking pants or jeans, but they are quite tight when I put them over my insulated snow pants. Still, they do fit and stay on/up well, and seem well-made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: geeky1

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaitors
customer_reviews.text: I love these gaitors. They are easy to use and do their job. I use them a lot for snowshoeing and hiking in wet conditions. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Wilkstar Woods

customer_reviews.title: Provided great protection while scouting elk in Eastern Oregon
customer_reviews.text: Bought for husband to accompany the Scarpa Men's Triolet Pro GTX Mountaineering Boot and they fit perfectly! Provided great protection while scouting elk in Eastern Oregon.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Keep rain out of your boots
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wet forest hiking in coastal Alaska. Even when it's not that cold, they keep so much water out.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Kaltenstein

customer_reviews.title: I were mine primarily in the winter months and love love love them
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for a while now and just reordered them for my daughter who is interning with the DNR for the summer. I were mine primarily in the winter months and love love love them.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: So useful while I was in Iceland
customer_reviews.text: So useful while I was in Iceland. Velcro is as velcro does and it does get magically stuck together and collects all the debris
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: These work great. I like to snowshoe
customer_reviews.text: These work great. I like to snowshoe, but I wear basketball shoes on top of the snowshoes to cut down on weight and these help keep the snow away from my pantlegs and socks.
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

customer_reviews.title: Don't hike without 'em.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these for 3 season hikes as we like to go off trail and scramble. (I wear the Crocodile "winter" gaiters for snow/rain). Keep legs free from scratches and keep rocks, stickers and debis out of the boots. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks to be an excellent product but way too small around the calf.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are made decent, but get larger than you ...
customer_reviews.text: They are made decent, but get larger than you think if you are going to be wearing them over boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jojogunn

customer_reviews.title: Served its purpose
customer_reviews.text: Pretty much did what it was supposed to. I don't know how often I will need these, but they were nice to have when dealing with knee deep snow.
customer_reviews.author: jazzvibes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They were great to use and did well during mountain hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Arkon

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Took them on an elk hunt for a week. Walked through snow and brush every day. Everything held up great! Super pleased with them. They look like they will hold up for many hunts to come!
customer_reviews.author: Dalton Herrington

customer_reviews.title: Work great and are durable thus far
customer_reviews.text: Work great and are durable thus far. My only minor gripe is that the top clasps would been better as velcro.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler F. Smirth

customer_reviews.title: The protectors themselves are great and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: The protectors themselves are great and heavy duty. Our problem is that the strap to go around the boot is too short; it isn't long enough to go around the boot/shoe and fasten into place. We have searched for a place to buy an extension but no luck yet!
customer_reviews.author: mamadeb

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Hard to beat for the price, bought them for my dad and his feet and pants stayed quite dry during rain periods hiking in tall grass and even wading though creeks. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my husband. They fit perfectly and work perfectly!! Great product and great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Hschramko

customer_reviews.title: Felt like a double amputee
customer_reviews.text: I felt nothing below the knees and they stayed in place the entire time.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good height, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: They were what I wanted. Good height, waterproof, and definitely put them through the test of hiking in wet conditions. Only complaint is that sometimes I couldn't get the top of the gaitor to really get tight and sometimes it would slide down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These fit excellent and are high quality
customer_reviews.text: These fit excellent and are high quality. I tried a cheaper off name brand and there is no comparison. The attention was paid to the small detail.s
customer_reviews.author: RConsultant

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I will be getting another pair , Love these !!
customer_reviews.author: AMADBIKER

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gaiters for winter snow shoeing or summer cross country hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gaitors, completely waterproof over a week of winter camping/hiking after spraying with silicone water sealant.
customer_reviews.author: gcspencer

customer_reviews.title: These worked just great in the deep snow
customer_reviews.text: These worked just great in the deep snow. No snow in my shoes and pants stayed dry. Good deal!
customer_reviews.author: FirstStateMark

customer_reviews.title: Put them to good use last winter!
customer_reviews.text: Finally got some 'good' tall gators. Easy to put on and performed flawlessly in the winter of 2014/15 in New England!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is durable and functional. It fits well and does not ride down on the leg. Good for applications in all seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Vancergk

customer_reviews.title: Great fit. Easy to get on
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Easy to get on. Good price for a must have in the PA. winters.
customer_reviews.author: sharon costomiris

customer_reviews.title: top gators at good price
customer_reviews.text: Great gators. Only gave them a4 becauseI am 6 feet tall and skinny. They seem slightly baggy but no big deal. Keep your boots dry for longer.
customer_reviews.author: J.D

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Keep snow out of your hiking or snow shoveling boot, keep your pants dry almost up to your knee. I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Jones

customer_reviews.title: These gaiters are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These gaiters are great for the price. They run small, I got the large. 5"8' 165#. I wore them every day on a recent mule deer hunt in Wyoming. They stood up to the sage brush and dew well.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit large but I rather have extra room than less
customer_reviews.author: Cristian

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gaiters look good and fit well. I have not had enough snow this year to give them a real test.
customer_reviews.author: David Parker

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Effective and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear while doing some work in deep snow. These are the first gaiters I've ever owned or used. I wear men's size 11 boots, and use these with hiking boots in that size. The covered the boots, and fit my calves, very well. Kept my legs dry, and snow out of my boots. Too soon to comment on durability, but I don't see anything to make me worry about that, yet.
customer_reviews.author: TervFan

customer_reviews.title: If you have big calves it may be hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: If you have big calves it may be hard to get it on. But what works for me is putting the Velcro together while it is all down by my ankle and then pulling it up my leg.
customer_reviews.author: James&Danica

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I love these things. They keep my legs dry when I do not need full coverage waterproof pants.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: keeps the snow out of my boots and keeps my feet warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Don Hinkle

customer_reviews.title: ... have made a winter full of snowy hikes a delight.
customer_reviews.text: I use these in conjunction with my Merrell Ice Claws (Boots) and together they have made a winter full of snowy hikes a delight.
customer_reviews.author: George Halvorson

customer_reviews.title: They are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for to keep us dry as we go snowshoeing. They are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Asluss

customer_reviews.title: Gators
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to put on and take off with my cross-country ski boots. They are rugged and I plan to use them this Spring.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy Musser

product_meta.title: Outdoor Research Mens' Rocky Mountain High Gaiters
product_meta.description:
The durable, traditional packcloth construction and a no-bulk design of the Rocky Mountain High Gaiters is all you need for solid all-season performance. Pair these lightweight gaiters with hiking boots or cross-country ski boots to keep rocks, dirt and light snow from finding its way into your footwear.

The durable, traditional packcloth construction and a no-bulk design of the Rocky Mountain High Gaiters is all you need for solid all-season performance. Pair these lightweight gaiters with hiking boots or cross-country ski boots to keep rocks, dirt and light snow from finding its way into your footwear.
feature_bullets: WATER-RESISTANT AND BREATHABLE: Strap these tough gaiters to your shoes or boots for ultimate trail protection. Rain, snow, mud, dirt and other debris are kept on the trail and out of your boots.

VERSATILE EQUIPMENT:  Gaiters are what this company was founded on. They can be used for hiking, running, hunting, fishing, backpacking, camping, and walking. Whatever you do, these gaiters will keep you protected and comfortable in the elements.
GEAR FEATURES: With a durable Hypalon instep strap, reinforced boot lace hooks, a buckle top closure with a hook and loop front closure, these gaiters latch on and don't let go.

TOUGH MATERIALS: The 100% nylon, 420D packcloth leg panel and 100% nylon, packcloth foot panel provide an abrasion-resistant gaiter that is built to withstand your terrain of choice for all-season use.

OUTDOOR RESEARCH: We built a company from a feeling: the urge to get out. It's what drives us. Our tribe is devoted to exploring our outdoor passions and challenging ourselves in the mountains, water, and deserts of the planet we love so much.
